column1: She sells seashells by the seashore. How can a clam cram in a clean cream can? Six slippery snails slid slowly seaward.

Can you can a can as a canner can can a can? If two witches would watch two watches, which witch would watch which watch?

Four fine fresh fish for you. I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream. Unique New York, you need New York.
I thought a thought but the thought I thought wasn't the thought I thought I thought. The big black bug bit the big black bear.
A proper copper coffee pot. A big bug bit the little beetle but the little beetle bit the big bug back.
Which wristwatches are Swiss wristwatches? A skunk sat on a stump and thunk the stump stunk, but the stump thunk the skunk stunk.
